task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 344°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full height of the main building in front, so I'll look up by rotating the camera's pitch to 30 degrees to capture the roof section that's currently out of view at pitch 0°.

To ensure I can reference the ground level and align the full building structure for an accurate height estimate, I'll rotate the camera's pitch down to -30 degrees to view the lower portion of the building.

After observing the full structure by looking up and down, the target building appears to be an 8-story multi-story structure; assuming each floor is approximately 3 meters tall, the total estimated height is 24 meters.
